@ensina @NetlifySupport @Netlify Hey Sina, Keep in mind that this hosting is for JAMstack (or pre-rendered) sites. So there is no server running at request time in which to run a PostgresSQL DB. You could perhaps use this via #serverless functions as part of a decoupled API architecture.
